title: Lethal 5+
body: Each time you make a shooting or fighting attack, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified 5+. This rule applies only when stated on a weapon profile.

title: Balanced
body: When making a shooting attack, you can reroll one of your attack dice.

title: Stun
body: On a critical hit, the target loses 1 APL (to a minimum of 1).

title: Conceal / Engage
body: Each operative has an Order: Conceal or Engage. Conceal limits visibility and targeting, while Engage allows shooting and fighting.
